name: XKCDComicReaderViewer
0:
”Alexa, open x. k. c. d. comic reader”
”show me a random comic”
”show me comic 1872”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: x. k. c. d. comic reader
des:
Reads or shows comics from xkcd.com. Will show comic and caption on Alexa devices with displays (like the Echo Show).

Note: Transcripts for comics after 1608 are not available due to a bug with XKCD's site
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
